headline: How McDonald’s Global Expansion and Menu Revamp Plans Will Impact McDonald's (MCD) Investors
summary: McDonald’s has outlined one of its biggest overhauls in years, combining an aggressive plan to open more than 8,000 new restaurants worldwide by 2027 with a 2026 U.S. rollout of globally popular items such as the Big Arch burger and Hot Honey Sauce. This push pairs physical expansion with menu innovation, AI-enabled drive-thru upgrades, and nostalgia-driven promotions like Changeables toys and special Pokémon Happy Meals to reinforce the brand’s relevance with both value-seeking and...
